When upgrading my IDE on a different machine, I got the exact same result 
again. PDE is preventing me from building (plugin import doesn't work either).

Surprisingly, my teammates do not see this issue... will look into it.

It doesn't occur if creating a brand new workspace. Must be some backward 
compatibility issue.
Discarding the .metadata/.config did not help either.

Interestingly, the first entry in the log after startup+press build button is:

Philippe,
The null pointer exception upon shutting down is now taken care of.
As for the original problem with the feature source project, does swapping the 
two statements in the startup() sequence solve the problem?  I'm a little 
unclear.  First, you said that it did, and then you said that it still occurred.

problem.
